channel.title: Comments on: WoW Patch 2.3 Scheduled for November 13

item.title: By: Daniel Smith
item.dc:creator: Daniel Smith
item.description:
I kinda agree, I for one spent two months farming 5K gold for my flyer and have to listen to everyone bitch about how expensive it is all the time. My reply....FARM IT.....like we all did.....lol.
As far as S1 glad gear for honor though I agree with that, especially since they're making the more desirable S3 pieces rating dependant, and there is almost no way for me to catch up with elite arena ppl as their gear will now be that much better (AGAIN) than mine. Arena points come too slowly to begin with. Also, the S1 glad staff or spellblade will really help me, since I've been running Kara like every night for THREE MONTHS and no Staff of Infinite Mysteries or Mindblade lol.
item.content:encoded:
I kinda agree, I for one spent two months farming 5K gold for my flyer and have to listen to everyone bitch about how expensive it is all the time. My reply….FARM IT…..like we all did…..lol.

As far as S1 glad gear for honor though I agree with that, especially since they’re making the more desirable S3 pieces rating dependant, and there is almost no way for me to catch up with elite arena ppl as their gear will now be that much better (AGAIN) than mine. Arena points come too slowly to begin with. Also, the S1 glad staff or spellblade will really help me, since I’ve been running Kara like every night for THREE MONTHS and no Staff of Infinite Mysteries or Mindblade lol.

item.title: By: BoneGod
item.dc:creator: BoneGod
item.description:
I think yu misread what the guy meant. He spent insane amount of time to get 5000G and his arena season 2 gear while all the peasants now can get it with little sweat and no skillz.
Welfare epic for the win! Yeah wow is getting so cheap so fast that you better wait a little while to get anything instead of raiding or doing anything else that takes too much time.
This is terrible for hardcore who quit the game and when they quit, many will follow because the game will become boring for all. Easy rewards is never a good answer to anything!
item.content:encoded:
I think yu misread what the guy meant. He spent insane amount of time to get 5000G and his arena season 2 gear while all the peasants now can get it with little sweat and no skillz.

Welfare epic for the win! Yeah wow is getting so cheap so fast that you better wait a little while to get anything instead of raiding or doing anything else that takes too much time.

This is terrible for hardcore who quit the game and when they quit, many will follow because the game will become boring for all. Easy rewards is never a good answer to anything!

item.title: By: Parker
item.dc:creator: Parker
item.description: WoW get a grip guy, if you want to be successful than you can farm honor to and stop crying about it, jesus, NOOB!
item.content:encoded: WoW get a grip guy, if you want to be successful than you can farm honor to and stop crying about it, jesus, NOOB!

item.title: By: Deano
item.dc:creator: Deano
item.description: This patchis going to be cheap, i mean now half the world of warcraft will have flying ecip mounts, which i have to pay 5000 gold for is riduced to 2000! WTF is that. and now that i have full season 2 areana gear everyone can farmhonor to the season one gear and will be automatically fully epiced. this sucks
item.content:encoded: This patchis going to be cheap, i mean now half the world of warcraft will have flying ecip mounts, which i have to pay 5000 gold for is riduced to 2000! WTF is that. and now that i have full season 2 areana gear everyone can farmhonor to the season one gear and will be automatically fully epiced. this sucks

item.title: By: HolyBoss
item.dc:creator: HolyBoss
item.description: For the alts, it will be very nice to see the changes in Pre BC Dungeon Boss loot. We could see some nice improvements on gear that you worked hard (Or got lucky) getting.
item.content:encoded: For the alts, it will be very nice to see the changes in Pre BC Dungeon Boss loot. We could see some nice improvements on gear that you worked hard (Or got lucky) getting.

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description:
Wow, that's a huge improvement for skilling up leatherworking, then. I don't regret having maxxed it, the dragonscale stuff is nice for my hunter; but when/if I finish leveling my old hunter, I'll be ecstatic not to be grinding clefthoof/paying for primal earths.
On the bonus side, the boots I made skilling up got me crystals to put enchants on weapons.
item.content:encoded:
Wow, that’s a huge improvement for skilling up leatherworking, then. I don’t regret having maxxed it, the dragonscale stuff is nice for my hunter; but when/if I finish leveling my old hunter, I’ll be ecstatic not to be grinding clefthoof/paying for primal earths.

On the bonus side, the boots I made skilling up got me crystals to put enchants on weapons.

item.title: By: wowpanda
item.dc:creator: wowpanda
item.description: Wo, finally! I just like the new interfaces (the quests, the good tracking device for trainers etc, that is a must). To me (or any botter), primals are still easier than others, so the drum change is not so hot (except the honored part)
item.content:encoded: Wo, finally! I just like the new interfaces (the quests, the good tracking device for trainers etc, that is a must). To me (or any botter), primals are still easier than others, so the drum change is not so hot (except the honored part)

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: @Puhase - I forgot about the drums! The day suddenly seems much brighter. Less clefthoof grinding = GG
item.content:encoded: @Puhase – I forgot about the drums! The day suddenly seems much brighter. Less clefthoof grinding = GG

item.title: By: Protest
item.dc:creator: Protest
item.description: Great news. I believe this would be an appropriate time to resub (again), as I am interested in testing out the improved leveling. Now to pick a server..
item.content:encoded: Great news. I believe this would be an appropriate time to resub (again), as I am interested in testing out the improved leveling. Now to pick a server..

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: Ground out almost max honor on two chars, plus all the requisite badges, for mountains of S1 gear come patch time. I'm almost physically tired from it. Hope I never set foot in a BG again.
item.content:encoded: Ground out almost max honor on two chars, plus all the requisite badges, for mountains of S1 gear come patch time. I’m almost physically tired from it. Hope I never set foot in a BG again.
